{{champion:103}} So my soul doesn't get wasted by thresh or karthus or something.

So you want it instead to be kept warm and furry - not to mention having your body wasted pleasantly for 20 seconds before your soul leaves it. Good call. :D

I did consider Ahri, but I figured it was a case of "get in line!". Thus a too obvious choice. ^^

What exactly does being a soul feel like though? Are you conscious? I mean I sure wouldn't mind seeing {{champion:103}} For the rest of my existence. Even if it is against my will... Actually it wouldn't be against my will :)
